00037 /*
00038  * Specific tags for specific requests
00039  *
00040  * \note EC remote end does not need to create these packets,
00041  * only using the getter functions.
00042  *
00043  * Regarding this, those classes are removed from remote build,
00044  * that have only a constructor.
00045  */
00046 
00047 class CServer;
00048 class CKnownFile;
00049 class CPartFile;
00050 class CSearchFile;
00051 class CUpDownClient;
00052 class CFriend;
00053 
00054 /*
00055  * EC tags encoder. Idea: if for an object <X>, client <Z> tag <Y> have value equal to previous
00056  * request, skip this tag.
00057  */
00058 
00059 class CValueMap {
00060         /*
00061          * Tag -> LastValue map. Hold last value that transmitted to remote side
00062          */
00063         std::map<ec_tagname_t, uint8> m_map_uint8;
00064         std::map<ec_tagname_t, uint16> m_map_uint16;
00065         std::map<ec_tagname_t, uint32> m_map_uint32;
00066         std::map<ec_tagname_t, uint64> m_map_uint64;
00067         std::map<ec_tagname_t, CMD4Hash> m_map_md4;
00068         std::map<ec_tagname_t, wxString> m_map_string;
00069         std::map<ec_tagname_t, CECTag> m_map_tag;
00070         
00071         template <class T>
00072         void CreateTagT(ec_tagname_t tagname, T value, std::map<ec_tagname_t, T> &map, CECTag *parent)
00073         {
00074             if ( (map.count(tagname) == 0) || (map[tagname] != value) ) {
00075                 parent->AddTag(CECTag(tagname, value));
00076                 map[tagname] = value;
00077             }
00078         }
00079     public:
00080         CValueMap()
00081         {
00082         }
00083         
00084         CValueMap(const CValueMap &valuemap)
00085         {
00086             m_map_uint8 = valuemap.m_map_uint8;
00087             m_map_uint16 = valuemap.m_map_uint16;
00088             m_map_uint32 = valuemap.m_map_uint32;
00089             m_map_uint64 = valuemap.m_map_uint64;
00090             m_map_md4 = valuemap.m_map_md4;
00091             m_map_string = valuemap.m_map_string;
00092             m_map_tag = valuemap.m_map_tag;
00093         }
00094         
00095         void CreateTag(ec_tagname_t tagname, uint8 value, CECTag *parent)
00096         {
00097             CreateTagT<uint8>(tagname, value, m_map_uint8, parent);
00098         }
00099         
00100         void CreateTag(ec_tagname_t tagname, uint16 value, CECTag *parent)
00101         {
00102             CreateTagT<uint16>(tagname, value, m_map_uint16, parent);
00103         }
00104         
00105         void CreateTag(ec_tagname_t tagname, uint32 value, CECTag *parent)
00106         {
00107             CreateTagT<uint32>(tagname, value, m_map_uint32, parent);
00108         }
00109         
00110         void CreateTag(ec_tagname_t tagname, uint64 value, CECTag *parent)
00111         {
00112             CreateTagT<uint64>(tagname, value, m_map_uint64, parent);
00113         }
00114         
00115         void CreateTag(ec_tagname_t tagname, CMD4Hash value, CECTag *parent)
00116         {
00117             CreateTagT<CMD4Hash>(tagname, value, m_map_md4, parent);
00118         }
00119         
00120         void CreateTag(ec_tagname_t tagname, wxString value, CECTag *parent)
00121         {
00122             CreateTagT<wxString>(tagname, value, m_map_string, parent);
00123         }
00124         
00125         bool AddTag(const CECTag &tag, CECTag *parent)
00126         {
00127             bool ret = false;
00128             ec_tagname_t tagname = tag.GetTagName();
00129             if (m_map_tag.count(tagname) == 0 || m_map_tag[tagname] != tag) {
00130                 m_map_tag[tagname] = tag;
00131                 parent->AddTag(tag);
00132                 ret = true;
00133             }
00134             return ret;
00135         }
00136 
00137         void ForgetTag(ec_tagname_t tagname)
00138         {
00139             m_map_tag.erase(tagname);
00140         }
00141 };
00142 
00143 class CEC_Category_Tag : public CECTag {
00144     public:
00145         CEC_Category_Tag(uint32 cat_index, EC_DETAIL_LEVEL detail_level = EC_DETAIL_FULL);
00146         // for create-upate commands
00147         CEC_Category_Tag(uint32 cat_index, wxString name, wxString path,
00148             wxString comment, uint32 color, uint8 prio);
00149         
00150         bool Apply();
00151         bool Create();
00152         
00153         wxString Name() const { return GetTagByNameSafe(EC_TAG_CATEGORY_TITLE)->GetStringData(); }
00154         wxString Path() const { return GetTagByNameSafe(EC_TAG_CATEGORY_PATH)->GetStringData(); }
00155         wxString Comment() const { return GetTagByNameSafe(EC_TAG_CATEGORY_COMMENT)->GetStringData(); }
00156         uint8 Prio() const { return GetTagByNameSafe(EC_TAG_CATEGORY_PRIO)->GetInt(); }
00157         uint32 Color() const { return GetTagByNameSafe(EC_TAG_CATEGORY_COLOR)->GetInt(); }
00158         
00159 };

00191 class CEC_ConnState_Tag : public CECTag {
00192     public:
00193         CEC_ConnState_Tag(EC_DETAIL_LEVEL);
00194 
00195         uint32  GetEd2kId()         const { return GetTagByNameSafe(EC_TAG_ED2K_ID)->GetInt(); }
00196         uint32  GetClientId()       const { return GetTagByNameSafe(EC_TAG_CLIENT_ID)->GetInt(); }
00197         bool    HasLowID()          const { return GetEd2kId() < HIGHEST_LOWID_ED2K_KAD; }
00198         bool    IsConnected()       const { return IsConnectedED2K() || IsConnectedKademlia(); }
00199         bool    IsConnectedED2K()   const { return (GetInt() & 0x01) != 0; }
00200         bool    IsConnectingED2K()  const { return (GetInt() & 0x02) != 0; }
00201         bool    IsConnectedKademlia()   const { return (GetInt() & 0x04) != 0; }
00202         bool    IsKadFirewalled()   const { return (GetInt() & 0x08) != 0; }
00203         bool    IsKadRunning()  const { return (GetInt() & 0x10) != 0; }
00204 };

00266         time_t      LastDateChanged(time_t *target = 0) const { return AssignIfExist(EC_TAG_PARTFILE_LAST_RECV, target); }
00267         uint32      DownloadActiveTime(uint32 *target = 0) const { return AssignIfExist(EC_TAG_PARTFILE_DOWNLOAD_ACTIVE, target); }

00274         uint32      TotalPacketsSavedDueToICH(uint32 *target = 0) const { return AssignIfExist(EC_TAG_PARTFILE_SAVED_ICH, target); }
00275 
00276         wxString    PartMetName() const
00277         {
00278             uint16 id = PartMetID();
00279             return id ? (CFormat(wxT("%03u.part.met")) % id) : wxEmptyString;
00280         }
00281 
00282         wxString    GetFileStatusString() const;
00283 };

00368 class CEC_Search_Tag : public CECTag {
00369     public:
00370         // search request
00371         CEC_Search_Tag(const wxString &name, EC_SEARCH_TYPE search_type, const wxString &file_type,
00372             const wxString &extension, uint32 avail, uint64 min_size, uint64 max_size);
00373             
00374         wxString SearchText() const { return GetTagByNameSafe(EC_TAG_SEARCH_NAME)->GetStringData(); }
00375         EC_SEARCH_TYPE SearchType() const { return (EC_SEARCH_TYPE)GetInt(); }
00376         uint64 MinSize() const { return GetTagByNameSafe(EC_TAG_SEARCH_MIN_SIZE)->GetInt(); }
00377         uint64 MaxSize() const { return GetTagByNameSafe(EC_TAG_SEARCH_MAX_SIZE)->GetInt(); }
00378         uint32 Avail() const { return GetTagByNameSafe(EC_TAG_SEARCH_AVAILABILITY)->GetInt(); }
00379         wxString SearchExt() const { return GetTagByNameSafe(EC_TAG_SEARCH_EXTENSION)->GetStringData(); }
00380         wxString SearchFileType() const { return GetTagByNameSafe(EC_TAG_SEARCH_FILE_TYPE)->GetStringData(); }
00381 };
00382 
00383 class CEC_StatTree_Node_Tag : public CECTag {
00384     public:
00385         CEC_StatTree_Node_Tag();    // just to keep compiler happy

00389 class CEC_Friend_Tag : public CECTag {

00393         uint32      ID() const                          { return GetInt(); }
00394         bool        Name(wxString &target) const        { return AssignIfExist(EC_TAG_FRIEND_NAME, target); }
00395         bool        UserHash(CMD4Hash &target) const    { return AssignIfExist(EC_TAG_FRIEND_HASH, target); }

00397         bool        Port(uint16 &target) const          { return AssignIfExist(EC_TAG_FRIEND_PORT, target); }
00398         bool        Client(uint32 &target) const        { return AssignIfExist(EC_TAG_FRIEND_CLIENT, target); }
